ygData.subject: Re: money?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That is a good idea.  Unfortunately, most people only realise this after the event.  Kind of like backing up your computer - everybody knows you should do
ygData.messageBody:
Matt Gleeson wrote:
>
> From: Matt Gleeson <gleeson@...>
>
> I keep a set of patchwork and a rusty bastard sword ("Old Rusty" from
> my newbie days) in the bank for just such an occasion. Its not much,
> but it's a little better than starting from nothing.
>
> I also keep a fire beetle eye and a spare drum in the bank for corpse
> retrievals.

That is a good idea. Unfortunately, most people only realise this
after the event. Kind of like backing up your computer - everybody
knows you should do it, but you don't realise how important it is
until it's too late. 8)

Mully
Veeshan
